name: Cusano - Nicaragua Esteli - Gordo
additionalNotes: Cusano Nicaragua is a budget-friendly boutique handmade in the prestigious Davidoff factory from a premium array of Dominican and Nicaraguan long-filler tobaccos gently tucked beneath an oily, caramel-hued San Andrés wrapper. A medium to full-bodied profile displays toasty notes of cedar, fresh ground coffee, and nuts with zesty spices and a warm and creamy finish. Cusano Nicaragua hits the sweet spot with everyday rock-bottom prices and luscious flavors handmade to the stringent standards of Davidoff’s finest cigars.
